message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this incredible product with you. I believe it has the potential to greatly benefit your business. I'm willing to offer it to you for $900000. I think this is a fair price considering its value to you.

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice. However, $900000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $750000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your concerns about the price, but I'm still confident that the product's value to you justifies a higher price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $850000. I believe this is a more reasonable compromise considering the product's worth to you.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I still think $850000 is a bit too high. I'm willing to pay $775000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand your persistence, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to go any lower than $825000. I believe this is the minimum price I'm willing to accept for the product, considering its value to me. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for my product.

I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still not convinced that $825000 is the right price for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $800000. I think this is the maximum I'm willing to pay for the product.
